note: Young retiree, happily married with 3 adorable pups who are the centre of our world. Enjoying a relaxed lifestyle after years of hard work, spending quality time with my furry best friends and husband. Fascinated by AI like Midjourney amongst others. Looking forward to connecting with fellow animal and tech enthusiasts!
